mapper.insert: insert into app_version (id, appId, versionNo, versionInfo, publishStatus, downloadLink, versionSize, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate, apkLocPath, apkFileName) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{versionno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versioninfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishstatus,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{downloadlink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionsize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{apklocpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apkfilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update app_version set appId = #{appid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, versionNo = #{versionno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, versionInfo = #{versioninfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publishStatus = #{publishstatus,jdbcType=BIGINT}, downloadLink = #{downloadlink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, versionSize = #{versionsize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, createdBy = #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creationDate = #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyBy = #{modifyby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifyDate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, apkLocPath = #{apklocpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apkFileName = #{apkfilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, appId, versionNo, versionInfo, publishStatus, downloadLink, versionSize, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate, apkLocPath, apkFileName from app_version where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, appId, versionNo, versionInfo, publishStatus, downloadLink, versionSize, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate, apkLocPath, apkFileName from app_version
select count(*) as count from app_version where appId = #{appId}
mapper.update:
update app_version
versionNo=#{versionNo}, versionInfo=#{versionInfo}, publishStatus=#{publishStatus}, downloadLink=#{downloadLink}, apkLocPath=#{apkLocPath}, versionSize=#{versionSize}, apkFileName=#{apkFileName}, modifyBy=#{modifyBy}, modifyDate=#{modifyDate},
update app_version set apkLocPath=null, downloadLink=null, apkFileName=null where id = #{id}
